resources.string: An exception occurred while compressing the log files. This could be caused by a lack of space, an error reading the log files, or even permission errors. Please double-check your storage and try again.
There were no log files to zip. This could also be caused by not having root access, or the commands to get the logs failed. If you ran SysLog with root access, please submit a bug report.
There was an exception while trying to create the folder to save all the logs. Please double check that your storage has space, and is properly mounted.

There was an error while running the commands to get the logs. If you did not use root, please restart the application and approve root access. Otherwise, please submit a bug report and include the SU implementation you use.
There was an unknown exception while running. Please submit a bug report, and include the SU implementation you use.
There was no application available to send a zip file. The logs have been saved, but please install or enable an email application or cloud storage application to easily send the file.
Your primary storage does not have enough free space. You currently have %.1f MB free. SysLog can try to free space by cleaning old log files.
